mapper.update: insert into membertbl (ID, PW, EMAIL, NAME, JOINDATE) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{name}, #{joindate});

create table membertbl ( IDX INTEGER not null auto_increment, ID VARCHAR(20) not null, PW VARCHAR(100) not null, EMAIL VARCHAR(100) null, HASEMAILAUTHED TINYINT not null default 0, NAME VARCHAR(30) not null, JOINDATE TIMESTAMP not null, MODIFYDATE TIMESTAMP not null default current_timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (IDX), UNIQUE KEY `id_UNIQUE` (`ID`) );
